itemInfo.itemDesc: A mushroom that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.

item.name: Ghost Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Marie Cave. Ghost Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 ※ Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
